H0.text: When people talk about LGBT rights, what does the ‘T’ represent. Transgender

H1.text: When people talk about LGBT rights, what does the ‘T’ represent. Transexual

H2.text: When people talk about LGBT rights, what does the ‘T’ represent. Third Gender

H3.text: When people talk about LGBT rights, what does the ‘T’ represent. Hegirl

A4.text: LGBTQ people are individuals who are lesbian, gay, bisexual, transgender, or queer.

A5.text: the term transgender has been increasingly preferred over transsexual

A6.text: the word transgender acquired its modern umbrella term meaning in the 1990s
